attributes.action: pass an act  to prevent private security firms from being allowed to patrol our streets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following a disturbing report on BBC news, regarding private security officers to patrol streets, or areas that lack Police Officers, we need to insist that more Police Officers and only Police Officers are employed to do this job, as some of the operatives from these private security firms look like thugs or gangsters, or the kind of people you would use to extract protection money, and if not watched, these so called operatives could become that; so let's insist the goverment gets more Police Officers on the streets, before this horrific nightmare could become a grim reality.
